mapper.insert: insert into member (mem_id, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_tel, mem_mail, mem_add, mem_bir, mem_gend, mem_nickname, admin_auth) values (#{mem_id}, SHA256.ENCRYPT(#{mem_pw}), #{mem_name}, #{mem_tel}, #{mem_mail}, #{mem_add}, #{mem_bir}, #{mem_gend}, #{mem_nickname}, #{admin_auth})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where mem_tel=#{mem_tel}
select count(*) from member where mem_id=#{mem_id}
select count(*) from member where mem_nickname=#{mem_nickname}
select count(*) from member where mem_id=#{mem_id}
select count(*) from member where mem_id=#{mem_id} and mem_pw=SHA256.ENCRYPT(#{mem_pw})
select mem_id from member where mem_name=#{mem_name} AND mem_tel=#{mem_tel}

select A.* from (select rownum as rnum , B.* from ( select * from member where mem_name != '관리자'
and mem_nickname like '%'||#{stext}||'%'
order by mem_name) B
where rownum <= #{end}) A where A.rnum >= #{start} and A.mem_name != '관리자'
mapper.update: update member set mem_pw = SHA256.ENCRYPT(#{mem_pw}) where mem_id=#{mem_id}
